body:
In the past couple of hours Michael was playing a song. Then stuff happen, and we suggested an Avicus Music Channel. So I went ahead and created it. This channel is suppose to have a purpose and isn't supposed to be a troll. However there will be some songs are quite explicit, so viewer discretion is advised.
Submit your songs here:
http://goo.gl/forms/fiYmMJ7Jqd
Uploaded Songs [Avicus user(s) creations]:
+ Michael Newcleus - Too Long of a Title (Original Mix)
Uploaded Songs [Third Party]:
